stringify

Stringifies an object. Map keys must not be null.

parse

public static java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String string)
Parses a JSON string. Supported escape characters in JSON strings are only \\, \", \r and \n.

Type Mapping

JSON Type Java Type
Boolean java.lang.Boolean
Number java.lang.Double
String java.lang.String
Array java.util.ArrayList
Object java.util.HashMap

Parameters:
string - The string to be parsed.
Returns:
The parsed object.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if JSON strings contains unsupported escape character.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if unrecognizable character found.
